name: Jimmy Kimmel
monologue: Roger Clemens was indicted by a grand jury for allegedly lying to Congress. You don’t lie to Congress unless you’re in Congress.

name: Jimmy Kimmel
monologue: Lindsay Lohan will supposedly get a million dollars for her first interview after prison. I need to start driving drunk into houses.

name: Jimmy Kimmel
monologue: A new poll found that 1 in 5 Americans believe President Obama is a Muslim. Remember during the campaign, when he was criticized for belonging to Reverend Wright’s church? What happened to that?

name: Jimmy Kimmel
monologue: President Obama is staying at Martha’s Vineyard, which has an obstructed view of the Atlantic Ocean, and just happens to point towards Mecca.
